attributes.action: To give one fan of every football a place on the board of directors every season.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am asking that one supporter from each of the 92 Football league clubs get a place on the Board of directors.
The fan would not get paid and would have to be elected by the fans of the club 2 weeks before the season starts.
The fan can sit in on all board meetings and have a vote on upcoming things at the club and then report it to the fans that have elected them.

The fans have no power at all with the clubs but are responsible for almost every single penny of revenue that a football club makes and it about time that we the fans had some power back instead of these untrustworthy greedy chairmen.
We never had clubs going under when fans were more involved did we?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
